content: single_crochet in last st join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet rnds 4-10 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 11 chain 1 2 single_crochet in 1st st in next 4 sts 4 single_crochet row 2-6 working in both loops chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across row 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease across 2 single_crochet row 8-9 chain 1 turn single_crochet across row 10 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet finish off 2nd 4th peels row 1 join w/ single_crochet in the next front loop to the left of the previous peel repeat as for first peel body round 1 w/ natural single_crochet in the back loops from round 14 of the banana 16 single_crochet round 2 working in both loops chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet
